title: Which of the following statements about the eme...

content.question: Which of the following statements about the emergence of rock and roll music as a part of 1950’s popular culture in the United States is true?

choices.label: It relied heavily on Black musical traditions.
It adopted many of the big band tunes of the 1940’s.
It was a spin-off from British popular music of the time.
It was the first popular music broadcast nationally on radio.
It had little appeal in the South and West.

content.answer: It relied heavily on Black musical traditions.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
